description: Joining the Zwei at his parents` request, this chubby boy of 16 years is timid and sheepish despite his great name. He hops between the elite Zwei and the street gang Team Blue, whose members gave him the nickname `Charlie`. He fell head over heels for Team Blue seductress Criff Kei, not realising until much too late that she was only leading him on.
name: Good Turtleland III
